title: Saturday Matinee: Conflicted
description:
On today’s Saturday Matinee, Russia invades—and loses. The podcast Conflicted looks into the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan.

Link to Conlficted: a History Podcast: https://evergreenpodcasts.com/conflicted
